english.verse1: You are my strength. Strength like no other. Strength like no other. Reaches to me.
english.verse2: You are my hope. Hope like no other. Hope like no other. Reaches to me.
english.verse3: Unfailing love, Stronger than mountains, Deeper than oceans, Reaches to me.
english.chorus: In the fullness of Your grace. In the power of Your Name. You lift me up. You lift me up.
english.bridge: Your love O Lord, Reaches to the heavens. Your faithfulness, Reaches to the sky.

chord.chorus: C Em D/F# G C D
chord.bridge: C G D Em C G D C G D Em C G D
